title: Registry Key Manipulation
description: The code attempts to remove a registry entry and create a shortcut in the Startup folder. However, it does not validate or sanitize the input used to construct these paths.
fix: Validate and sanitize all user inputs before using them to construct file paths or registry keys.

reasoning.pattern: The code constructs file paths and registry keys using user-controlled data without validation.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could exploit this by manipulating the environment or input to point to arbitrary locations, leading to unauthorized access or modification.
